General.Name: Vejii Holdings Ltd
General.Description: Veji Holdings Ltd. does not have significant operations. Previously, it was involved in the provision of plant-based and living products of various brands in Canada and the United States. The company's products categories comprise grocery, protein and sports nutrition, personal care, vitamins and supplements, vegan wines, and baby and kid supplies through its shopvejii.com direct-to-consumer e-commerce marketplace. Veji Holdings Ltd. was incorporated in 2019 and is headquartered in Kelowna, Canada.
General.Address: 507 ? 460 Doyle Ave, Kelowna, BC, Canada, V1Y 0C2
